title: Middleweight World Title Fights(1981-1982)(Disk 3)-desspratt-
description:
ULTIMATE COLLECTION: Middleweight World Title Fights (1981-1982) Various 
The source is from VHS and the format is NTSC 
Picture quality is fair and sound quality is fair 




***Many thanks to Bazooka72 & GPater11093 for providing the content for this disk*** 

 This was my overly ambitious attempt to make a spoiler free collection of all the middleweight Title fights from 1980 to the present day.... the collection actually starts in 1978 

EDIT: I got as far as 1994. So this collection has 16 years of World title fights in the middleweight division, All in a Spoiler-Free chronological order (more or less). There are 20 disks in total.


Even though I set out to make this a spoiler-free set.....I have named the next few disks "The Marvin Hagler Years".

 I have done this because the man is a 'Legend of Boxing' and deserves to have his title reign acknowledged! I have also done this because I had not yet come across a Hagler set that had these fights in chronological order. I have left the menu with a similar design to continue the theme ( dates instead of names ) but I have added a picture of The Marvelous One, this is for the benefit of the members who grab these disks for the Hagler content only ( these members should take note that Hagler appears on both previous disks ).

 The idea behind this set is that if you download each disk in order: You will be able to watch every single Middleweight Title fight in the correct order and without spoilers ( This is for the benefit of any members who have not seen the fights and do not know the results ).

This collection includes all WBA, WBC, IBF and WBO Middleweight title fights from 1980 to 1993. Some British and European title fights feature along with a few eliminator bouts.....if my memory serves me correctly! Enjoy.


This is Disk 3 of 20:

Not all the disks in this collection are NTSC and some are Dual-Layer (DVD9).

Watch history in the making as titles change hands and real legends of the ring are born. All bouts on this disk are for the WBA & WBC Middleweight titles:

Menu Screenshot:

[URL=https://imageshack.com/i/b59vfxj][IMG]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/1024x768q90/401/9vfx.jpg[/IMG][/URL]



Bout One: 13th June 1981: Vito Antuofermo Vs. Marvin Hagler II.

Bout Two: 3rd October 1981: Marvin Hagler Vs. Mustafa Hamsho.

Bout Three: 7th March 1982: Marvin Hagler Vs. William Lee.

Bout Four: 30th October 1982: Marvin Hagler Vs. Fulgencio Obelmejias II
